trans-unit.source: Invalid cover page format. Accepted formats are .gif, .jpg, or .png.

trans-unit.source: The layout editor prepares these files for each galley and then uploads to the appropriate Proofs for proofreading.

trans-unit.source: Any files that have already been uploaded to any submission stage can be added to the Proofreading listing by checking the Include checkbox below and clicking Search: all available files will be listed and can be chosen for inclusion.
